meanings.definition: A period of time approximately equal to the period of the moon's revolution and amounting to about 30 days or 4 weeks.
meanings.sent1: Last month, we celebrated my birthday with a cake.
meanings.sent2: I have to pay my rent at the beginning of each month.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the calendar, making it impossible to track the month.
meanings.sent4: Time flew by like a fast-forwarded month during the busy holiday season.
meanings.sent5: The anticipation of the new year made the upcoming month feel like an eternity.

meanings.definition: One of the twelve parts into which the year is divided, each having a name and number.
meanings.sent1: December is the twelfth month of the year.
meanings.sent2: My favorite month is September because of the beautiful autumn colors.
meanings.sent3: The month of July seemed to be in a hurry to finish its summer vacation.
meanings.sent4: Each month is like a chapter in the book of time, telling its own unique story.
meanings.sent5: The month of May bloomed with flowers and promises of new beginnings.
